mapper.select: SELECT id_ FROM act_re_procdef where key_ = #{procDefKey} order by version_ desc limit 1
SELECT if( a.end_time_ is not null, '结束', '处理中') as status FROM act_hi_procinst a where a.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInsId}

SELECT b.id_ AS "task.id", if(b.ACT_TYPE_='endEvent', 'End', b.ACT_NAME_) AS "task.name", b.ASSIGNEE_ AS "task.assignee", ifnull(( SELECT concat( login_name, ' : ', NAME ) FROM sys_user WHERE id = b.ASSIGNEE_ ),b.ASSIGNEE_) AS "task.assigneeName", b.EXECUTION_ID_ AS "task.executionId", b.act_id_ AS "task.taskDefinitionKey", b.START_TIME_ AS "task.createTime", b.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "task.processDefinitionId", b.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "processInstanceId", b.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "task.processInstanceId", if( a.end_time_ is not null, '结束', '处理中') as "status", SUBSTRING_INDEX( b.PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 ) AS "task.processDefKey" FROM act_hi_procinst a join (SELECT * FROM act_hi_actinst WHERE ID_ IN (select id_ from v_act_hi_current_task) ) b on a.PROC_INST_ID_ = b.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE 1=1
and LOWER(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 )) = LOWER (#{processDefinitionKey})
and a.end_time_ is null
and a.end_time_ is not null
AND b.START_TIME_ > #{startTime}
AND b.START_TIME_ < #{endTime}
AND exists(select 1 from act_hi_varinst v where v.PROC_INST_ID_ = a.PROC_INST_ID_ and v.name_='title' and v.TEXT_ like '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%') )
order by b.START_TIME_ desc

SELECT id_ AS "task.id", name_ AS "task.name", ASSIGNEE_ AS "task.assignee", ( SELECT concat( login_name, ' : ', NAME ) FROM sys_user WHERE id = ASSIGNEE_ ) AS "task.assigneeName", EXECUTION_ID_ AS "task.executionId", TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "task.taskDefinitionKey", CREATE_TIME_ AS "task.createTime", PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "task.processDefinitionId", PROC_INST_ID_ AS "task.processInstanceId", SUBSTRING_INDEX( PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 ) AS "task.processDefKey" FROM act_ru_task t WHERE ( assignee_ = #{task.assignee} OR assignee_ IN ( SELECT OWNER FROM wf_delegate WHERE delegate = #{task.assignee} AND now() BETWEEN start_time AND end_time) OR (assignee_ is null and exists(select 1 from act_ru_identitylink where task_id_= t.id_ and user_id_ = #{task.assignee})) )
and (LOWER(SUBSTRING_INDEX( PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 )) = 'prpo' OR LOWER(SUBSTRING_INDEX( PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 )) = 'pr')
and LOWER(SUBSTRING_INDEX( PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 )) = LOWER (#{processDefinitionKey})
AND CREATE_TIME_ > #{startTime}
AND CREATE_TIME_ < #{endTime}
AND getProcessVar(PROC_INST_ID_, 'title') like '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
order by CREATE_TIME_ desc

select `PROC_INST_ID_` as processInstanceId, `PROC_DEF_ID_` as processDefinitionId, `START_TIME_` as startTime, `END_TIME_` as endTime from act_hi_procinst a
a.END_TIME_ is not null
and exists (select 1 from act_hi_varinst v where v.PROC_INST_ID_=a.PROC_INST_ID_ and v.NAME_ = 'title' and v.TEXT_ LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%') )
ORDER BY a.END_TIME_ desc

select if(a.ACT_TYPE_='endEvent', 'End', a.ACT_NAME_) as name, a.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, concat(u.login_name,' : ',u.name) as assigneeName from act_hi_actinst a left join sys_user u on a.ASSIGNEE_ = u.id where a.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInsId} and a.ACT_TYPE_ in ('userTask','startEvent','endEvent') order by a.START_TIME_ desc, a.ACT_TYPE_ desc limit 1
